name: UMaterialParameterCollection
doc:
Asset class that contains a list of parameter names and their default values.
Any number of materials can reference these parameters and get new values when the parameter values are changed.

methods.name: GetScalarParameterDefaultValue
GetScalarParameterNames
methods.doc: Returns an array of the names of all the scalar parameters in this Material Parameter Collection *

methods.name: GetVectorParameterDefaultValue
GetVectorParameterNames
methods.doc: Returns an array of the names of all the vector parameters in this Material Parameter Collection *
